docs.lead_paragraph: Update | 9:47 p.m. Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner said Wednesday that none of the 19 financial institutions that underwent government stress tests were insolvent and the results would reassure the public that the American financial system is sound.

headline.main: Geithner Says Stress Tests Found No Insolvent Banks
